TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FaultContractAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class FaultContractAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class FaultContractAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定服务操作遇到处理错误时返回的一个或多个 SOAP 错误。

span.span: Specifies one or more SOAP faults that are returned when a service operation encounters processing errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性标记操作以声明一个或多个特定的异常条件，这些条件可作为操作返回的显式 SOAP 错误消息添加到服务操作的 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 的描述中。Mark an operation with the attribute to declare one or more specific exception conditions that are added to the Web Service Description Language (WSDL) description of the service operation as explicit SOAP fault messages returned by the operation. 在所有托管应用程序中，处理错误由 对象表示。In all managed applications, processing errors are represented by objects. 在基于 SOAP 的应用程序如 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 应用程序，服务方法来传递处理错误信息使用 SOAP 错误消息。In SOAP-based applications such as Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) applications, service methods communicate processing error information using SOAP fault messages. 由于在两种错误系统下执行 WCF 应用程序，必须发送到客户端的任何托管的异常信息必须可从异常转换为 SOAP 错误。Because WCF applications execute under both types of error systems, any managed exception information that must be sent to the client must be converted from exceptions into SOAP faults. 您可以使用默认的服务异常行为，或者可以显式控制异常是否能被映射到错误消息，以及如何映射到错误消息。You can use the default service exception behaviors, or you can explicitly control whether -- and how -- exceptions are mapped to fault messages. 异常和 WCF 应用程序中的 SOAP 错误的概述，请参阅[指定和处理在协定和服务中的错误](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services.md)。For an overview of exceptions and SOAP faults in WCF applications, see [Specifying and Handling Faults in Contracts and Services](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services.md). 建议服务操作使用 来正式指定在正常操作过程中客户端可能收到的所有 SOAP 错误。It is recommended that service operations use the to formally specify all SOAP faults that a client can expect to receive in the normal course of an operation. 此外，还建议在 SOAP 错误中仅返回客户端必须了解的信息，以将信息泄露风险降至最低。It is also recommended that only that information a client must know is returned in a SOAP fault to minimize information disclosure. - 属性控制错误消息的操作。The property controls the action of the fault message. - 属性获取在错误消息中序列化的详细信息对象的类型。The property gets the type of the detail object serialized in the fault message. - 和 属性分别控制错误消息的名称和命名空间。The and properties control the name and namespace, respectively, of the fault message. - 指示错误消息是否具有指定的保护级别，如果有，则由 属性控制该保护级别。The indicates whether the fault message has a protection level specified, and if so, the property controls that level of protection. > [!CAUTION] > 如果错误消息传送的信息为敏感信息，或可能导致安全问题，则强烈建议设置 属性。If a fault message carries information that is sensitive or can lead to security problems, it is strongly recommended that the property be set. - 如果将 显式设置为 或 ，则您必须使用启用安全的绑定（通过使用绑定上的 属性启用安全），否则，就会引发异常。If you set the explicitly to either or , then you must use a binding with security enabled using the property on the binding or an exception is thrown. - 如果您选择启用安全的绑定，并且未在协定的任何位置设置 属性，则将对所有的应用程序数据进行加密或签名。If you select a binding that enables security and you do not set the property anywhere on the contract, all application data will be encrypted and signed. - 如果您选择未启用安全的绑定（例如， 在默认情况下禁用安全），并且没有显式设置 ，那么所有应用程序数据都不会受到保护。If you select a binding that does not have security enabled (for example, the has security disabled by default), and the is not explicitly set, then none of the application data will be protected. 在大多数情况下，将错误消息的 设置为 已经足够了。For many scenarios setting to for fault messages is sufficient. 有关更多详细信息，请参阅[了解保护级别](~/docs/framework/wcf/understanding-protection-level.md)。For more details, see [Understanding Protection Level](~/docs/framework/wcf/understanding-protection-level.md). 若要从使用 进行标记的操作返回指定的错误，则在操作过程中发生托管异常时将引发 （此处类型参数为可序列化的错误信息）。To return a specified fault from an operation marked with , throw a (where the type parameter is the serializable error information) when the managed exception occurs during the operation. WCF 客户端应用程序作为相同类型呈现的 SOAP 错误，如抛出客户端实现-也就是说，作为（其中类型参数是可序列化的错误信息）。WCF client applications surface the SOAP fault as the same type as was thrown in the client implementation -- that is, as a (where the typeparameter is the serializable error information). 只能用来为双向服务操作和异步操作对指定 SOAP 错误；单向操作并不支持 SOAP 错误，因而不支持 。The can be used only to specify SOAP faults for two-way service operations and for asynchronous operation pairs; one-way operations do not support SOAP faults and therefore do not support . > [!NOTE] > 您可以使用任意可序列化的类型来传达错误信息。You can use any serializable type to convey error information. 在此版本的 WCF 中的唯一限制是在中指定类型必须可由序列化。The only restriction in this version of WCF is that types specified in a must be serializable by the . 有关序列化支持提供，请参阅[数据协定序列化程序](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-serializer.md)。For the serialization support the provides, see [Data Contract Serializer](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-serializer.md). 例如，若要指定客户端可能收到包含 的 SOAP 错误，请将该类型参数置于服务方法的 之中。For example, to specify that clients can expect a SOAP fault that contains an , place that type parameter in the on your service method. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例并未设置 、 或 属性。The following code examples do not set the , , or properties. [!code-csharp[C_FCA#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_fca/cs/fcademo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[C_FCA#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_fca/vb/fcademo.vb#1)] 然后，在您的服务方法中，引发一个新的 ，此处类型参数为包含错误信息（在上例中，为 ）的类型。Then, in your service method, throw a new where the type parameter is the type that contains the error information (in the above case, a ). 例如:For example: [!code-csharp[C_FCA#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_fca/cs/fcademo.cs#2)] [!code-vb[C_FCA#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_fca/vb/fcademo.vb#2)] 上面的示例很基本；使用 代码几乎可以传递所有信息，因此该详细信息类型并非最为有用的。The preceding example is very basic; almost any information can be passed using an code, so this detail type is not the most useful. 通常情况下，WCF 应用程序使用特定于客户端错误信息要求的详细信息类型来指定 SOAP 错误。Typically, WCF applications specify SOAP faults with detail types specific to the error information requirements of the client. 有关更多的完整示例，请参见“示例”部分。For a more complete example, see the Example section. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定一个类型参数为 的 ，则该字符串值将被分配给客户端应用程序中的 Detail 属性；客户端无法通过调用 方法来检索该字符串。If you specify a where the type parameter is a , the string value is assigned to the Detail property in the client application; clients cannot retrieve that string by calling the method. 若要在客户端应用程序调用 时返回该字符串值，则将在操作内引发 异常，并将该字符串传递给构造函数。To have the string value returned when the client application calls , throw a exception inside the operation and pass the string to the constructor. 若要在引发了异常或 时显式控制应用程序的行为，则请在 、 或 上实现 接口，并将其分配给 属性。To explicitly control the behavior of the application when an exception or is thrown, implement the interface on an , or and assign it to the property. 您可以显式控制生成的 SOAP 错误以及是否将其发送回客户端。 enables you to explicitly control the SOAP fault that is generated and whether to send it back to the client. 为了便于调试，设置到`true`代码或者您可以使用应用程序配置文件中。To facilitate debugging, set the to `true` in code or you can use the in an application configuration file. 当启用时，服务会自动将异常信息返回到调用方。When enabled, the service automatically returns exception information to the caller. 这些错误在客户端显示为 异常。These faults appear to the client as exceptions. > [!IMPORTANT] > 因为托管的异常可以公开内部应用程序信息，请设置或到`true`可以允许 WCF 客户端获得有关内部服务操作异常，包括个人信息身份信息或其他敏感信息。Because managed exceptions can expose internal application information, setting or to `true` can permit WCF clients to obtain information about internal service operation exceptions, including personally identifiable or other sensitive information. > > 因此，仅建议将 或 设置为 `true` 作为一种临时调试服务应用程序的方法。Therefore, setting or to `true` is only recommended as a way of temporarily debugging a service application. 此外，以这种方式返回未处理的托管异常的方法的 WSDL 并不包含类型为 的 的协定。In addition, the WSDL for a method that returns unhandled managed exceptions in this way does not contain the contract for the of type . 客户端必须预见未知 SOAP 错误的可能性 (返回给 WCF 客户端作为对象) 以便正确获取调试信息。Clients must expect the possibility of an unknown SOAP fault (returned to WCF clients as objects) to obtain the debugging information properly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 来指定 `SampleMethod` 操作可以使用详细信息类型 `GreetingFault` 返回 SOAP 错误。The following code example shows the use of to specify that the `SampleMethod` operation can return a SOAP fault with the detail type of `GreetingFault`. [!code-csharp[FaultContractAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/faultcontractattribute/cs/services.cs#1)] [!code-vb[FaultContractAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/faultcontractattribute/vb/services.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示 WCF 客户端的`ISampleService`作为此 SOAP 错误类型的`GreetingFault`。The following code example shows that WCF clients of `ISampleService` experience this SOAP fault as a of type `GreetingFault`. [!code-csharp[FaultContractAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/faultcontractattribute/cs/client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[FaultContractAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/faultcontractattribute/vb/client.vb#3)]

param.name: detailType
param.span: 包含调用方错误信息的可序列化类型。

span.span: The serializable type that contains error information for the caller.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常通过将属性应用到服务方法并指定一个类型作为该属性中的自变量来执行构造函数。The constructor is typically executed by applying the attribute to a service method and specifying a type as the argument in the attribute. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 来指定 `SampleMethod` 操作可以使用详细信息类型 `GreetingFault` 返回 SOAP 错误。The following code example shows the use of to specify that the `SampleMethod` operation can return a SOAP fault with the detail type of `GreetingFault`. [!code-csharp[FaultContractAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/faultcontractattribute/cs/services.cs#1)] [!code-vb[FaultContractAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/faultcontractattribute/vb/services.vb#1)]

member this.Action : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置已指定作为操作协定一部分的 SOAP 错误消息的操作。

span.span: Gets or sets the action of the SOAP fault message that is specified as part of the operation contract.

value.span: SOAP 错误消息的操作值。

span.span: The value of the action for the SOAP fault message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于控制 SOAP 错误消息的操作。Use to control the action of the SOAP fault message.

value.span: 表示可序列化错误类的类型。

span.span: The type that represents the serializable error class.

public: property bool HasProtectionLevel { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 SOAP 错误消息是否分配有保护级别。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the SOAP fault message has a protection level assigned.

value.span: 如果错误消息具有保护级别，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the fault message has a protection level; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定 SOAP 错误消息是否必须加密和/或签名。Use the property to specify whether the SOAP fault message must be encrypted, signed, or both. 有关详细信息，请参见 属性。See the property for details.

summary.span: 获取或设置 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 中的错误消息的名称。

value.span: 默认名称是用作错误详细信息类型的名称。

span.span: The default is the name of the type used as the fault detail.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::Security::ProtectionLevel ProtectionLevel { System::Net::Security::ProtectionLevel get(); void set(System::Net::Security::ProtectionLevel value); };
member this.ProtectionLevel : System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel with get, set

summary.span: 指定 SOAP 错误要求的绑定的保护级别。

span.span: Specifies the level of protection the SOAP fault requires from the binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定发送 SOAP 错误时绑定必须加密和/或签名的程度。Use the property to specify the degree to which the binding must encrypt, sign, or both when sending the SOAP fault. 强烈建议操作错误显式确定协定上的安全保护级别要求。It is strongly recommended that an operation's fault explicitly decide the security protection level requirements on the contract. 默认的保护级别为 ，这意味着您定义的 SOAP 错误消息并不需要加密或数字签名（虽然您的绑定在有此配置的情况下可以提供此类支持）。The default protection level is , meaning that the SOAP fault message you are defining does not require encryption or a digital signature (although your binding may provide this support if it is configured to do so). 如果错误消息传送的信息为敏感信息，或可能导致安全问题，则强烈建议将 属性设置为 。If a fault message carries information that is sensitive or can lead to security problems, it is strongly recommended that the property be set to . 有关安全问题的详细信息，请参阅[了解保护级别](~/docs/framework/wcf/understanding-protection-level.md)。For more about security issues, see [Understanding Protection Level](~/docs/framework/wcf/understanding-protection-level.md). 运行时的保护行为是具有层次结构的保护级别属性的组合。The protection behavior at runtime is the combination of the protection-level properties that have a hierarchical structure. 除非已为较窄范围显式设置了某个不同的值，否则设置最外层的值将为所有较窄的范围确定默认设置。Setting the outermost value establishes the default setting for all narrower scopes unless a different value for a narrower scope is explicitly set. 在这种情况下，外层的值将保持所有较窄的范围的默认设置，但特定的设置除外。In this case, the outer value remains the default for all narrower scopes with the exception of that specifically set. 例如，如果 设置为 ，并且其他较窄范围没有设置保护级别，则操作协定中的所有消息（包括错误消息）都需进行加密和签名。For example, if is set to and no other narrower scopes have protection level settings, all messages in an operation contract are encrypted and signed, including fault messages. 但是，如果其中某个操作将 设置为 ，那么该操作的消息就需进行签名，但协定中的其他所有消息（包括错误消息）需要进行加密和签名。If, however, one of those operations has the set to , then the messages for that operation are signed but all other messages in the contract are encrypted and signed, including fault messages. 这些值的设置范围是：The scopes at which these values are set are: 上的 属性。The property on . 上的 属性。The property on . 当协定上没有显式指定保护级别并且基础绑定支持安全性时（无论处于传输级别还是处于消息级别），整个协定的有效保护级别将为 。When there is no protection level explicitly specified on the contract and the underlying binding supports security (whether at the transport or message level), the effective protection level for the whole contract is . 如果绑定不支持安全性（如 ），则整个协定的有效 为 。If the binding does not support security (such as ), the effective is for the whole contract. 因此，根据终结点绑定，即使协定指定了 ，客户端也可以要求不同的消息或传输级别安全保护。The result is that depending upon the endpoint binding, clients can require different message or transport level security protection even when the contract specifies .
